- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Toby, Sounds good. Please let me know if you need any assistance in the interim. Thank you!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: John Toby Knudsen [mailto:tobyknudsen@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2012 12:49 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Greetings Sara,
You have my gratitude for your assistance today and I will update you as I become informed of this prospective contract.
Sincerely, TobyOn Tue, Apr 3, 2012 at 11:49 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Toby , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15brEx4%2FviKJ6fNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15brEx4%2FviKJ6fNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
